entry.title: EXTREME COLD WARNING , Wabush Lake
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 10:51 AM AST Sunday 05 February 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: Partly Cloudy, -21.2°C

entry.title: Sunday: Sunny. High minus 20.
entry.summary: Sunny. Wind becoming southwest 20 km/h this afternoon. High minus 20. Wind chill minus 33 this afternoon. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 11:30 AM AST Sunday 05 February 2023

entry.title: Sunday night: Clear. Low minus 36.
entry.summary: Clear. Wind southwest 20 km/h becoming light near midnight. Low minus 36. Wind chill minus 30 this evening and minus 46 overnight. Frostbite in minutes. Forecast issued 11:30 AM AST Sunday 05 February 2023
